question: During the early 1990s, people began using cell phones to communicate. The development of the cell phone was most likely a response to the need of society to
candidate_answers: (A) be able to communicate when sick. (B) provide a safer method of communicating. (C) provide more jobs in the communication industry. (D) be able to communicate when away from home.
answer: provide more jobs in the communication industry.
label: C
